Articles.Content:
Evening.

I stumbled on the wiki part creation page with its out of date info. I've [edited](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Tutorial:Making_an_asset_from_start_to_finish) it to reflect the newer process with Unity/PartTools. May even put some screen grabs in later on.

Any chance I can persuade a few of you lovely people to do the same with other bits on the wiki if you have some knowledge to share? I know, I know... But better late than never!
Don't see why this is the wrong forum? I'm asking those who are developing KSP mods to join in updating a few wiki articles. Seems the right place to me!

> 
> Don't see why this is the wrong forum? I'm asking those who are developing KSP mods to join in updating a few wiki articles. Seems the right place to me!

Ah okay... so whoops.... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
